item.simplymore.myrmedge.tooltip2: The more hungry you are, the faster you move
item.simplymore.myrmedge.tooltip3: and the more damage you deal.

item.simplymore.myrmedge.tooltip5: health to fill your hunger bar. If you reach

item.simplymore.myrmedge.tooltip9: but your target gains weakness and mining fatigue.

attack nor move, but gain extra defense.
If you are hit during this, return to normal
and stun inside your aura for a short duration.

the target has Withering Fate, add an
Jump backwards and turn into mist.
If there is a target within 10 blocks
in front of you, teleport to them, leaving

item.simplymore.stasis.tooltip5: The lightning does not hurt you.

item.simplymore.boas_fang.tooltip6: poison. Gain speed when dashing back.
item.simplymore.lustrous_moxie.tooltip2: Chance on hit to apply Radiant Mark.
item.simplymore.lustrous_moxie.tooltip3: You deal true damage equal to the level of

item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip2: Chance on hit to steal and judge an
item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip3: enemy's soul. While the target is without
item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip4: their soul, positive effects are drained much
item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip5: faster. After %s seconds, their soul is returned.
item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip6: Return a target's soul prematurely, blinding,
item.simplymore.soul_foreseer.tooltip7: slowing and teleporting them to you.

item.simplymore.earthshatter.tooltip8: weakened, slowed and inflicted with armor crunch.
item.simplymore.serpentine_valour.toolti: This weapon deals 4 additional damage if
the target has poison or venom.
Summon 4 poison bolts above you which
will chase down enemies. Poison bolts
will wait 2 seconds before firing if an enemy
is within 5 blocks of you when spawning.
item.simplymore.brassturn.tooltip2: Hitting targets causes this weapon to oxidize,
item.simplymore.brassturn.tooltip3: lowering its swing speed to a halt. Chance on
item.simplymore.brassturn.tooltip4: hit to summon a jet of steam which flings people up.
item.simplymore.brassturn.tooltip5: Gradually remove the oxidization from the weapon.
item.simplymore.brassturn.tooltip6: This sometimes sprays sparks which can stun enemies.

item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip2: While held, summon a crow to follow you.

item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip4: crow, up to a maximum of 5. The more crows that follow you,
item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip5: the longer and more severe the bleed effect.
item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip6: Command all crows to attack a single target, causing them
item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip7: to swarm, damage and blind the enemy. The more crows commanded,
item.simplymore.deaths_eyrie.tooltip8: the longer the crows swarm. Part of the damage inflicted is

item.simplymore.revvengine.tooltip2: The more damaged you are, the more damage you deal.

item.simplymore.revvengine.tooltip5: how long you charge. The range and damage of these
item.simplymore.revvengine.tooltip6: abilities are based on the more damaged you are.
item.simplymore.exedrill.tooltip2: Hitting enemies will heat this weapon up.

item.simplymore.exedrill.tooltip4: mining fatigue to those nearby. This chance is increased
item.simplymore.exedrill.tooltip5: whilst mounted. Causing tremors will greatly heat this weapon.
item.simplymore.exedrill.tooltip6: Once fully heated, your next attack will cause an explosion
item.simplymore.exedrill.tooltip7: and earthquake which throws enemies away.
